findings.title: No transfer event emitted when basic transfer called
findings.description: The contract does not emit a transfer event when a basic transfer is called.

findings.title: Owner can call triggerZeusBuyback that’s initiate buyback
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to call the triggerZeusBuyback function, which initiates a buyback.

findings.title: Owner can clear buyback multiplier
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to clear the buyback multiplier, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change auto buyback settings
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify auto buyback settings, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change buyback multiplier settings
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify buyback multiplier settings, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum allowed transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can include in and exclude from dividends
findings.description: The owner has privileges to include or exclude users from receiving dividends.

findings.title: Owner can include in and exclude from fee and transaction amount
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to include or exclude certain fees and transaction amounts, which could lead to potential manipulation of financial transactions.

findings.title: Owner can change fees
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify fees, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change fee receivers
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify fee receivers, which could lead to unauthorized changes and potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change swap threshold and disable/enable swap
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify swap settings, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change target liquidity values
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify target liquidity values.

findings.title: Owner can change distribution criteria
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the distribution criteria, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change distribution GAS
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the distribution gas settings.
